name: 2019 the 4th International Conference on Cloud Computing and Big Data Analytics (ICCCBDA 2019)--Ei Compendex and Scopus
content: \*Publication: All the accepted papers of ICCCBDA 2019 will be included into Conference Proceedings which will be published and submitted to EI Compendex and Scopus. Publication History: ICCCBDA 2018 - ISBN: 978-1-5386-4300-6 IEEE Xplore Online | Ei-Compendex & Scopus index ICCCBDA 2017 - ISBN: 978-1-5090-4497-9 IEEE Xplore Online | Ei-Compendex & Scopus index ICCCBDA 2016 - ISBN: 978-1-5090-2593-0 IEEE Xplore Online | Ei-Compendex & Scopus index
